messages.subject: Hello everone
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, i just joined so i thought that i d interduse myself. I m 21 years in age currenty in college for computer science, and i ve allways had an keen intrest
messages.messageBody:
Hello, i just joined so i thought that i'd interduse myself.
I'm 21 years in age currenty in college for computer science, and i've
allways had an keen intrest in the japanese culture, history, and film
aswell as anime. I first got intrested in the shinsengumi from the
anime Rurouni Kenshin, with Saitou as my favorite charector. Soon
after i found myself trying to get a hold on anything that deals with
the Shinsengumi. Right now i'm currently reading "Shinsengumi: The
Shogun's Last Samurai Corps" and i cant seem to put it down.

Heres a list of some Shinsengumi related materials i own:

anime:
Rurouni Kenshin (all three arks)
Peace Maker
Shura no Toki

Movies:
Mibugishiden (When the Last Sword is Drawn)
Taboo

Books:
Shinsengumi: The Shogun's Last Samurai Corps
Sakamoto Ryoma and the Meiji Restoration

and probably soom other stuff i cant think of

anyway nice to meet everyone
